title: Define System Requirements
description: Investigate and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the autonomous drone hive system. This includes preparing use cases, performance criteria, security considerations (including FAA regulations), regulatory compliance, outlining integration strategies with existing systems or third-party services, addressing potential scalability issues, and providing clear, concise documentation easily accessible to all relevant stakeholders. Additionally, consider the user interface requirements for operators and the data visualization needs for analysts.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for drone management, mission planning, communication, data processing, and user interfaces.

title: Develop Drone Control and Communication
description: Implement the software and hardware components for controlling and communicating with individual drones and the swarm.

title: Implement Mission Planning and Optimization
description: Develop algorithms and tools for planning and optimizing missions based on objectives, constraints, and environmental conditions.

title: Build Data Processing and Analytics
description: Implement data processing pipelines and analytics tools for analyzing sensor data, mission data, and system performance.

title: Develop User Interfaces
description: Design and implement user interfaces for mission planning, monitoring, and system administration.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Develop security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure system integrity and data privacy.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the system components.

title: Conduct System Testing and Validation
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and system-level validation.

title: Prepare Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create user manuals, system documentation, and training materials for administrators and end-users.
